text: (And He it is Who hath produced) created (you from a single being) from Adam, (and (hath given you) a habitation) in the wombs (and a repository) in the loins; it is also said this means: He has given you a habitation in the loins and repository in the wombs. (We have detailed Our revelations for a people who have understanding) of Allah's command and His divine Oneness.
